transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Namaskar sir.
Customer: Ji, Namaskar.
Executive: Sir, Ujjwal baat kar sakta tha. Subah morning mein baat hui thi na aapse?
Customer: Ji sir, bataiye.
Executive: Haan, toh sir maine na aapse baat kari thi, matlab main wait kar raha tha. Fir mere paas ek team se call aaya tha ki aapke sir ne matlab jo aapke purane account manager rahe honge na, jo 15 din pehle se service dekhte the. Toh unke paas
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unhone mere ko call kiya ki ek baar aap baat kar lijiye client ko matlab service. Toh maine call kari, toh sir aapke father zyada baat karte hai nahi. Main unko samjhane ki koshish kar raha tha. Unhone kaha ki buyleads ke related maine reply kiya hai ki service bekar hai. Theek, main samjha, matlab jaanna chah raha tha, us pe discuss kar raha tha, samjhane ki koshish kar raha tha, lekin baat kuch kari nahi. Toh main try kar raha tha. Toh sir is pe sir main yehi keh sakta hu ki sir main apne hand se
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Main aapko, main aapko ek baat bahut clear, aapko bahut acche se samjhata hu. Toh papa thoda abhi distance chal rahe hai, thoda abhi jaise ek dedh mahina abhi thoda apna woh aaram bhi kar rahe hai aur thoda hum bhi unhe koi zyada zor de nahi rahe hai kisi bhi cheez ka. Toh abhi woh aaram kar rahe hai, thoda factory bhi zyada dekh nahi rahe. Mobile baithe hue use kar rahe honge woh baat alag hai. Lekin main aapko personally batau, IndiaMART wagera hum jitne bhi B2B portal hai, itne saalo se chalate hue aa rahe hai aur bahut acche prime member bhi rahe hai hum aapke. Toh abhi main aapko sirf itna hi kahunga ki
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Abhi aap mere khayal se papa se toh koi discussion na hi kare toh zyada accha hai. Aur baki bas main itna kahunga ki main unko bol deta hu ki apne end se koi feedback na dale. Aur
Customer: Sir, haan, nahi nahi main keh raha hu sir agar feedback sir dalna ho na toh aisa kar, toh na sir matlab sir ko bhi jo issue aa raha hai, main ek WhatsApp group bana deta hu aapki company ke naam se. Theek sir? Jis pe aap rahoge, aapka, aapke papa ka jo number aap kahoge woh number add kar deta hu. Main apna number kar deta hu. 
Executive: Papa ka number WhatsApp pe hai hi nahi. Aap ek kaam karo, mera laga dena, koi dikkat nahi hai. Mere se bhi mere se baat kar sakte hai.
Customer: Aur Pragati ji ka jo number, haan.
Executive: Bas.
Customer: Pragati ji ka number hai woh bhi add kar deta hu.
Executive: Haan, haan, koi dikkat nahi hai. Baki na main aapko, maine waise Pragati mam se bhi meri baat hui hui hai, Abhishek sir hai shayad unse bhi hui hui hai. Aur main bas abhi filhaal itna hi kahunga ki abhi shayad is year toh hum koi abhi matlab membership continue nahi karenge. But after Jan aur Feb mein dobara se restart karne wale hai sari cheeze, tab dekhte hai, focus karte hai.
Customer: Sir, koi dikkat nahi hai. Matlab main matlab apne hand se koi forceful nahi bolunga. Bas ek chota sa suggestion aapko aur dunga. Sir jo aapke paas direct call aati hai na sir, tab sabse zyada chances hai aapko matlab business milne ka direct call par.
Executive: Mujhe pata lag gaya tha, aap mujhe pata hai aap uske bare mein kehna chah rahe honge ki call pick nahi ho rahi hogi jiski wajah se hamara down bhi ja raha hoga.
Customer: Bilkul. Bahut zyada down ja raha hai sir.
Executive: Aap mujhe ek do din ka time dijiye. Abhi thoda na factory mein aaj off tha hamara. Toh main kya karta hu jo papa ka number laga hua hai na alternate number, usko woh jo number hai main usko toh main alternate kar dunga. Aur jo main number hai usko main apna dal dunga taki main call pick kar saku.
Customer: Haan, sir isme bhi matlab maximum paanch number hum add kar sakte hai, theek sir? Toh aap aise number add kar dijiye ya aap apna kar dijiye ya factory mein jo aisa koi core employee ho jo matlab aapke behalf se bhi woh handle kar sake thoda bahut call.
Executive: Nahi aapki baat toh sahi hai. Problem kya hai na sir, ab dekho number toh mera bhi laga hua hai. Lekin ye mere paas call nahi aati kyuki mere secondary number mein ja raha hai woh. Toh jo
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Toh jo main number hai na sir woh main kya bolte hai apna dal dunga usme call pick wagera kar liya karunga, koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Aur aap jitne matlab jitne zyada aap zyada number rakhenge na sir, toh number add karne se ye rehta hai ki paanch number agar aapne add kar diye toh koi bhi customer call karta hai na toh paancho phone mein ek saath aayegi ring. Theek hai? Aur us ring mein jo bhi pehle pick kar lega, paanch mein se jisne bhi pehle call pick kari, toh us baki sari call us phone se disconnect ho jayegi.
Executive: Ji ji ji, aapki baat sahi hai. Lekin sir aise mein, aisa aap baat toh sahi keh rahe ho lekin mere pe call nahi aati hai, aisa kyu? Mere pe toh nahi aati, number toh mera bhi laga hua hai.
Customer: Sir dekhiye, yaha pe jo number hai na main aapko verbally bata de raha hu. Ek number hai 99 se start ho raha hai aur 786 se khatam ho raha hai. Ji ji ji. Theek, ek aapka start ho raha hai 98 se start ho raha hai lekin end ho raha hai 259 se. Ye aapka
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Toh sir isme bhi matlab call kar denge.
Executive: Nahi, ye 259 wala aapka hai last mein jo end ho raha hai mere father ka. Nahi nahi, mera hai 7351249696.
Customer: Toh sir fir is call pe na ye number add hi nahi hai. Toh matlab dono call, dono
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Haan, toh do number isi pe call aa rahi hai jo uth pati uthate hai sir jo news ki nahi hai.
Toh jab tak aap apna number add nahi karaoge na toh sir baat nahi banegi. Ji sir. Aap apna add kar lijiye ya apne employee ka add kar lijiye. Koi dikkat nahi. Agar sir kahi pe doubt ho raha hai toh aap guidance ke liye mere ko phone kar lijiyega, main aapki help out kar dunga. Sure sure sure sure. Aur isi number, ye number hai aapka matlab call pe toh main aap isi number
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Toh sir main WhatsApp bana deta hu. Aur sir ek baar sir ko matlab kyuki aap jo bhi complaint raise karoge, the end of the end matlab main aapko hi coordinate, main aapko hi karunga sir. Bilkul sir bilkul. Okay. Kyuki sir jo jiske paas account hai, solution aap usi se le sakte ho. Bilkul sahi baat hai. Theek, mere hand pe hai sir toh fir aapko ye rahega ki bhai complaint main kahi aur kar raha, discuss aapni yaha pe kar raha. Toh matlab main ye rahega ki sir aapko main jitna bhi hu aap mere ko batao main aapki sari. Bilkul sir.
Customer: Jo bhi problem aa rahi resolve karne ki apne hand se puri koshish karunga.
Executive: Okay sir, okay.
Executive: Okay ji.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's father replied buyleads service is useless.

- Customer is not receiving calls on his number.



Resolution:

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group.

- Executive will change the main number to his.

- Executive will help with any guidance needed.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will change number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp group, call forwarding, membership
